## Load data

```{r}
# reading years
year_seq <- seq(2019,2025,1)


bmu_df <- lapply(year_seq, function(x){
  file_path <- file.path(elexon_path, "data_by_year", paste0("wind_gen_bmu_", x, ".csv.gz"))
  fread(file_path)
}) %>% bind_rows()

```
